comment.text: The translation key "SendButton" is used to display the label "Send" in various contexts, including buttons and dialog footers. It appears on change email and password dialogs, as well as a phone erasure description in another dialog. Its purpose is to provide a clear action for users to confirm changes or initiate actions.

usage.context:
</ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className="send"
 key="ChangeEmailSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:SendButton")}
 size="normal"
 scale
 primary
 onClick={this.onValidateEmail}
 isLoading={isRequestRunning}

</ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className="send"
 key="ChangePasswordSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:SendButton")}
 size="normal"
 scale
 primary
 onClick={this.onSendPasswordChangeInstructions}
 isLoading={isRequestRunning}

<Text>{t("MobilePhoneEraseDescription")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 key="ChangePhoneSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:SendButton")}
 size="normal"
 scale
 primary
 onClick={this.onChangePhone}
 isLoading={isRequestRunning}

</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 key="DeleteSelfSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:SendButton")}
 size="normal"
 scale
 primary
 onClick={this.onDeleteSelfProfileInstructions}
 isLoading={isRequestRunning}

</StyledBodyContent>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className="send-button"
 label={isLoading ? t("Common:Sending") : t("Common:SendButton")}
 size="normal"
 primary
 onClick={onSendRequest}
 isLoading={isLoading}
 isDisabled={isLoading}

<Text>{t("SendInviteAgainDialogMessage")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 id="send-inite-again-modal_submit"
 label={t("Common:SendButton")}
 size="normal"
 scale
 primary
 onClick={this.onSendInvite}
 isLoading={isRequestRunning}

<Button
 id="forgot-password-modal_send"
 className="modal-dialog-button"
 key="ForgotSendBtn"
 label={
 isLoading ? t("Common:LoadingProcessing") : t("Common:SendButton")
 }
 size={ButtonSize.normal}
 scale
 primary
 onClick={onSendPasswordInstructions}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Göndərin" is a valid Azerbaijani word, it's the imperative form (command form) of 'send'. The English 'Send' in a UI context is usually a noun or a request, and a more suitable translation would be 'Göndər' (the infinitive form) or a noun like 'Göndərmə'.

While 'Pošalji' is a valid Serbian word, it's a command form (imperative). 'Send' in this context is likely intended as a label on a button, not an instruction. A more appropriate translation might be a noun form or a less direct equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Slanje' (Sending) or 'Pošta' (Mail) depending on the context. Alternatively, keep 'Pošalji' if the command form is deliberately intended for stylistic reasons.
